escalation_patterns.name: Document Name Mismatch
escalation_patterns.reason: Document discrepancies can result in visa denial or entry refusal

escalation_patterns.name: Missing Signatures
escalation_patterns.reason: Missing signatures can invalidate official documents

escalation_patterns.name: Conflicting Information
escalation_patterns.reason: Conflicting information requires manual review to resolve

escalation_patterns.name: Deadline Violation
escalation_patterns.reason: Missed deadlines may result in application rejection
